## Slide 2
It's common knowledge that learning is better in small classes.  Is this really true? Take a look at the SAT scores to find out!

## Slide 3
In some states, only a few percent of eligible students sit the SAT exams, and they get top marks. See for yourself!

## Slide 4
The data suggests that where teachers are paid more, more students sit the SAT exams.  It might be explained if wealthier areas pay teachers better, and expect students to go to college. Take a look at the data yourself!
